title: Bananas in pyjamas: monster bananas
creator_credit: ABC-TV (Australia), Helena Harris and Tony Tilse
brief_description: B1 and B2, the Teddies and the Rat-in-the-hat are up to their old tricks in ten different stories: “Goldilocks Bananas”, “Magic Carpet”, “Wibbly Wobbly”, “Monster Bananas”, “Morgan’s Cubby”, “Ratmobile”, “Strictly Bananas”, “Shadow Painting”, “Banana Shop” and “Mirror Mirror.” Some of the escapades include B1 and B2 disguising themselves as sea-monsters when they find some seaweed on the beach and their crazy attempts at carpentry where they try to mend furniture but end up redesigning it instead!
